Hey Im kind of new to this so be gentle. When I double click the .iso files they open to a window with four folders data, documentation, languages and speech. What am I doing wrong?

same here chill..When I double click the .iso files they open to a window with four folders data, documentation, languages and speech.
FOR MAC:
Double click all language iso files (to open with DiskImageMounter), then go open Rosetta Stone, and at the top-right, one of the drop down menus will give you the option to "Add or Remove Languages". Click that and proceed through the steps.
